text: No ADD baseball, please. The game doesn’t need shortcuts. People who love baseball take it in all forms, including extra innings. If this rule existed in ‘14, Brandon Belt’s 18th inning game-winning HR in NLDS vs Nats wouldn’t have happened & SF may not have gone to World Series.

text: The one good outcome of the Mueller report so far: @realDonaldTrump has silenced his Twitter feed. Almost a full day. If it goes on any longer, his followers won’t know where to direct their anger and hatred.

text:
I’d rather just limit rosters to 10 pitchers. That would limit the number of pitching moves, force pitchers to learn to go into the 7th, 8th and, egads! 9th innings.

Teams routinely carry 13 pitchers and four-man benches. This has altered the game, w/less strategy, more Ks.

text:
A sports writer’s self interest would make for some amazing rules changes. 
— No extra innings 
— No dramatic lead changes after 9 pm
— 3 warmup pitches btwn innings/ pitching changes
— Max of 2 pitching changes/game
— 3-out innings replaced by clock: 5 minute max per half inning
